rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A modest lobby with a reception counter and coat closet.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: The main living area with ample natural light from windows; positioned according to Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow. Features minimalistic decor due to budget constraints.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen placed in the southeast as per Vastu principles; includes basic cabinetry and a small dining area extension.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom located near the kitchen for ease of access, with water-efficient fixtures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a balcony for fresh air and natural light. Positioned in the north-west quadrant as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Compact guest room with balcony access; positioned to maintain privacy and airflow.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated space for home entertainment in a corner of the floor, sound-insulated and optimized according to Vastu for positive energy.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious terrace area designed for relaxation and occasional gatherings. Features cost-effective materials and open layout for natural ventilation.
